data.title: laurent4's shop
data.meta_description: Delcampe brings together buyers and sellers of collectable items from all over the world. Join the community and discover exceptional items!
data.text:
From 2nd of April 2024: purchase 3 or more auctions items (to be posted together) and receive a 0.50 Euro cent discount on all items purchase from items 4 onward (example: purchase 8 items from us = discount of 3.50 EURO or purchase 50 items from us = discount of 23.50 EURO etc) - Discount (price to pay reduction) will be applied manually when sending you the total to pay (bill)… If lower bid are offered (and accepted) no ADDITIONAL discount will be made available… Not available on “Buying It Now” items

A partir du 2 avril 2024 : achetez 3 articles ou plus (vente aux enchère - à poster ensemble) et recevez une réduction de 0,50 centime d'EURO sur tous les articles achetés à partir de l'article 4 (exemple : achetez 8 articles chez nous = réduction de 3,50 EURO - achetez 50 articles chez nous = réduction de 23,50 EURO, etc.) - La réduction sera appliquez manuellement au moment de l'envois de votre facture… Si une proposition d'offe inferrieure est demander (et accepter) plus de réduction supplémentaire… pas de réduction sur les article vendue en “vente directe”

We will generally accept up to 20% reduction (maximum) on many items for sale on Delcampe (items for sale for minimum stating price of 1 EURO - if less than 1 EURO we will decline the lower offer) (except coin or banknote items = max -10% discount)

En ce monent nous acceptons un maximum de réducton jusqu'à -20% au maximum (minimum de 1 EURO prix de départ de la vente)(exception pour article mis en vente avec des pièces de monnaie ou billet = le maximum accepter est de -10% de réduction)

Until the end of December 2024 we are posting all auction lots within Australia at NO postal cost to buyers...

(the FREE Postage offer is for regular air mail - Not registered post which is still charged at cost...)

Due to COVID-19 Pandemic still active (and current war in Russia/Ukraine - Gaza/Israel), auction lots may take longer than usual to reach their destination... sorry it's out of my hands!

(If not satisfied with POST OFFICES postage cost & mail travel time), please do NOT bid on any of our items…

See more

PLEASE NOTE: due to the POSTAL SERVICE been known to be "not very efficient = lots of stolen or lost mail" purchases to some countries such as China, India, Central and South America + many others Asian & Middle Eastern country + most of Africa + & some European countries, we will only send purchase items via REGISTERED Mail (generally quicker & safer to arrive with the buyers...)

Due to COVID 19 Pandemic (& the Ukraine War + Middle-East War), purchase will most likely take longer than usual to reach you...

A cause de la pandemie du COVID-19 (et guerre en Ukraine et Moyen Orient) vos achats prendront surement plus de temps à vous parvenir...

Aufgrund der COVID-19-Pandemie dauert der Kauf höchstwahrscheinlich länger als gewöhnlich, um Sie zu erreichen ...

Debido a la pandemia de COVID 19, lo más probable es que la compra tarde más de lo habitual en llegar a usted ....

A causa della pandemia di COVID 19, è molto probabile che l'acquisto impiegherà più tempo del solito per raggiungerti ...

Vanwege de COVID 19-pandemie duurt het waarschijnlijk langer voordat de aankoop bij u aankomt ...

Proposer vos offres (simple ou groupée) et faites de bones affaires et des économies...

Do make us some single (or group) offer and get some savings...

As from 1st January 2023 / A partir du 1er Janvier 2023

In English: (Australia POST postage price increase from 2nd April 2024 & new mail zoning apply - reflecting COVID-19 Pandemic - New postal rules from January 2023...)

in French: (4 Janvier 2023 changement du tarif postal en Australie & Nouvelle Zone Postales - à cause de l'épidemie de COVID-19 - Nouveaux réglements postaux à partir de Janvier 2023)

(If you do not agree with postage & handling charges please do NOT bid on any of our items !)

Australiazone 1

New ZealandZone 2

Asia & PacificZone 3 & 4

US, Canada

UK, Europe

(Russia & South Africa)Zone 5

Rest of the World

(& others countries)regular size"small" letter

(about 6 to 8 postcards (or covers) - max 5 mm thick (max 12cm)€ 1.50€ 2.30€ 2.50€ 2.90€ 3.1051g to 125 g letter (abolished)

251 g to 500 g letter (abolished)

up to 250 g large letter

(about 40 to 50 + postcards or covers = regular size - max 2 cm thick)€ 3.00€ 6.00€ 7.00€ 10.00€ 11.00Above 500 g

please ask for estimate cost (will have to be posted in a Box)…

Some countries within Europe & Asia are also in ZONE 5 for postage cost ? They include Armenia, Azerbaijan, Belarus, Croatia, Faroe Isl, French Guiana, Georgia, Gibraltar, Greenland, Guadeloupe, Holy See [Vatican City], Kazakhstan, Krygzystan, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Martinique, Moldova, Reunion Isl, St Martin Isl, St Pierre & Miquelon, Tajikistan, Turkmenistan & Uzbekistan.

Registerded POSTED Mail (within Australia)

130 x 240 (small letter) maximum weight 250g (or 5 mm thick) - EURO 4.50 (pre-paid envelope without POSTAGE stamps applied)

250 x 353 (large letter) maximum weight 500g (or 2 cm thick) - EURO 5.50 (pre-paid envelope without POSTAGE stamps applied)

Registerded POSTED Mail (to any country wordwide cost the same)

130 x 240 (small letter) maximum weight 250g (or 5 mm thick) - EURO 14.50 (pre-paid envelope without POSTAGE stamps applied)

250 x 353 (large letter) maximum weight 500g (or 2 cm thick) - EURO 21.00 (pre-paid envelope without POSTAGE stamps applied)

MESSAGE to Delcampe Members / Message aux membres de Delcampe

Due to numerous lots being unpaid for in the last few months, please note that ALL Paypal or Delcampe Pay PAYMENT are required within 7 days of purchase

(or within 30 days if paying by cash in the mail)...

Negative feedback will be left after this delays and items placed back on sale (and buyers name will be blacklisted in my Delcampe shop)...

Due à un nombre important de lots lot qui sont restez impayer durant les mois passer, noter que TOUT payment par Paypal ou Delcampe Pay devrons être reçu dans les 7 jours après avoir gagner le lot(s) , pour payment par cash par courrier veuillez régler votre facture dans les 4 semaines après avoir gagner vos lot(s)

Des évaluation négative seront laissez après c'est délais et les lots seront remis en vente (et le client mis sur liste noire d'acheteur dans mon magasin Delcampe)...

All question in regard to lot(s) for sale will be answered as fast as possible... We do NOT provide scan of back of postcard (for privacy and copyright reasons).

Toutes question ayant rapport au lot(s) en vente seront repondue aussi rapidement que possble... Nous ne fournissons pas de scan du dos des carte postale (pour raison de privacy)

_____________________________________________________________________________________

If you believe that I have wrongly price an items, do not hesitate to make me an offer...

I will considerate it and either accept it or make you a counter offer or (refuse it...)

Si vous pensez que le prix de vente demander est trop élever, n'hésiter pas à me faire une offre... Je la considerais avec attention et au choix, l'accepterais ou vous ferais une contre-offre (ou la refuserait....)

Method of Payment accepted:

Paypal or via Mango Pay

(sur et rapide moyen de régler vos transactions)…

IMPORTANT, PLEASE NOTE:

NO BANQUE TRANSFER POSSIBLE - Pas de transfer de Banque à Banque possible

Payment pour les membres FRANCAIS:

Paypal (RECOMMANDER) ou Mangopay

We take and send you photos via E-mail of your envelope ready for POSTING...

I do sincerely hope your purchases arrive to you SAFELY and will enrich your collection

(and do not takes extra long to get to you due to worldwide COVID-19 Pandemic) & war in Russia & Ukraine (and also in Israel with GAZA)
